com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx
Class VirtualGroup

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx.GraphicObject
      com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx.VirtualGroup

public class VirtualGroup
extends GraphicObject

This call permits to gather some GraphicObject So when a transformation is executing, the tranformation will be applied on all of the GraphicObject contained in the VirtualGroup. TODO Determinate bounds and the center positions

Author:
Vianney

Adds a GraphicObject to the list. The GraphicObject which are added, will be drawn only when this VirutalGroup is attached to the canvas.

public GraphicObject setFillColor(Color color)
Sets the color of the fill for this VirtualGroup. All of the GraphicObject will have the same color.

setStroke

public GraphicObject setStroke(Color color,
                               int width)
Sets the stroke color and width for this VirtualGroup. All GraphicObject contained in this VirtualGroup will have the same width and color of the stroke.
